mapper.select: SELECT no, id, name, grade, point FROM member ORDER BY no
SELECT a.no, a.id, a.name, a.grade, a.point FROM (SELECT no, id, name, grade, point FROM member ORDER BY point desc)m WHERE ROWNUM =1
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET no = MEMBER_SEQ.nextval, id = #{id}, name =#{name}, grade=#{grade}, point=#{point}
